rules_text: Whenever Lurking Vyrkolakas attacks, exile target card from a graveyard. If a nonland card was exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If a land card was exiled this way, this creature gains lifelink until end of turn.
notes: reworked: Was 1/1 with lifelink and ’Whenever Lurking Vyrkolakas enters or attacks, target player exiles a card from their graveyard. If a nonland card was exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Lurking Vyrkolakas and you gain 1 life.’
